title: Presenting 'Code Switch': To Love And Not Forgive With Ashley C. Ford
description:
In this special episode from our friends at the Code Switch podcast, we feature author Ashley C. Ford. For much of her childhood, Ford's father was incarcerated, and her mother struggled to raise her while grappling with her own upended life plans. In her recent memoir, Somebody's Daughter, Ford explores how these formative conditions shaped her understanding of childhood, authority, forgiveness and freedom.

You can follow us on Twitter @NPRItsBeenAMin and email us at samsanders@npr.org.
